parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sorts all children of given path. Value of [[CT_TREE|Tree View]] entries is used for sorting.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control [[tvSortByValue]] [path, reversed]

</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name> p2</name>=<value> [path, reversed]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name> p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the parent item to sort

</value></part><part><name> p4</name>=<value> reversed (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to reverse sort it. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2 </name>=<value>[[tvSortByValue]] [idc, path, reversed]

</value></part><part><name> p21</name>=<value> [idc, path, reversed]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name> p22</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control idc

</value></part><part><name> p23</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of the parent item to sort

</value></part><part><name> p24</name>=<value> reversed (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to reverse sort it. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>control [[tvSortByValue]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSortByValue]] [102, [0], [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSortAll]] [[tvSort]] [[tvSortByValueAll]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
